Public NotInheritable Class HashTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformBase Implements IDataView, ITransformTemplate
type HashTransform = class inherit OneToOneTransformBase interface ITransformTemplate interface IDataTransform interface IDataView interface ISchematized interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: This transform can hash either single valued columns or vector columns. For vector columns, it hashes each slot separately. It can hash either text values or key values.
